scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-html: npx html-minifier-terser public/index.html -o public/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js false --minify-css false
scripts.minify-js: npx uglify-js public/app.js -o public/app.js && npx uglify-js public/gemini.js -o public/gemini.js
